snippet: Bowing to complaints about spoilers on social media, CBS agreed to make broadcast delays for the Pacific and Mountain time zones optional this year
abstract: CBS will offer its stations and affiliates in Pacific and Mountain time zones option of broadcasting Feb 15 Grammy Awards show live for first time in awards' history; had previously delayed telecast of show, which is being held in Staples Center in Los Angeles, by three hours for stations on West Coast.
lead_paragraph: Bowing to complaints about spoilers on social media, CBS agreed to make broadcast delays for the Pacific and Mountain time zones optional this year

headline.main: Grammy Awards to Air Live, Even on West Coast
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Grammy Awards to Air Live, Even on the West Coast
